meeting_request.purpose: Help deciding between graduate school and industry work
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Javier, a second-year majoring in East Asian Languages and Literatures. I’ve had a really strong academic experience, with a mix of classes in history, literature, and language. I’ve been really passionate about East Asian cultures and languages, and I’ve done well in my major. Recently, I’ve been thinking about graduate school or industry work as a way to further explore my interests, but I’m not sure what to do next. I’ve had a lot of faculty advisors, and I’ve been working on a thesis, but I’m not sure if that’s the right path. I’m also considering transferring to a different major, but I’m not sure what I’d like to do after graduation. I’m open to advice on graduate school, industry work, or something else, but I’m not sure where to start.
